title: kAttukkoNDirukkum
sahitya:
kAttukkoNDirukkum immanuvElanai


anupallavi

  kAraNa guru nAthanE paripUraNanE jIva uddhAraNanE nI enai


caraNam 1    enda nEramum unai cintai seidETriDa santatam unait-tudittEn nAn pOTriDa
maindanAga Or nindai aNugAmalE vandu kAttaruL sei inda ulaginilenai
    caraNam 2    niddirai seyal citta viruttiyil metta AdarittE ennaik-kAttiDa
cittam koNDenin pakkam ninri umshuddha parshuddhanEshakti nAyakanE enai
    caraNam 3    caNDALar tuiyar shatru seya aNDAmal enai anudinamum kAttu
koNDADak-krpai kaNDADa dinam tuDi paN pADa alagunaik-kaNDODa vizhi pOL enai
    caraNam 4    eNNum nanmaigaL yAvum unnuLLam eNNi Etravai tannait-tandiDa
maNNin mA tuyar mATri mA pugazh viNNilEyum vara AbirahAm dEvanAga
